channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 01:48 Air anxiety in the Nikolaev area follow further messages.
item.description: 游댮 01:48 Air anxiety in the Nikolaev area follow further messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游댮 01:41 Air alarm to the Kiev region follow the following messages.
